ComicInfo.Title: Varriors
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sam Kickwell and his partner in karate and love, Agent Cynthia Weaver, jump-kick their way into the belly of the beast – a Karate-Gang-Filled Mansion! They will have to punch, kick, stab, shoot and even sex their way through one vengeful, weapons-heavy, black-belted gang after another just to get near America's greatest enemy... the evil dictator, Neon!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Devin Roth (a) & Yaoyao Ma Van As (c) | 1 | | B | "Warriors" Movie Variant Cover B, Limited to 1500 | Daniël Arruda Massa | 2 | | C | "Sexy Time" Artist Variant Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Bill McKay | 3 | | D | April O'Neil Photo Cover D, Limited to 1500 | Photo | 4 |
